title: About <0>me</0>
content:
Hello, my name is Guilherme! I'm graduated in Analysis and Systems Development and very passionate about programming and innovation, with over 4 years of experience in software engineering. I have knowledge in many widely used technologies, with focus on cost reduction and fast development.

Throughout my career, I have worked on challenging projects and gained experience in different areas of software engineering. I always strive to stay updated with industry best practices and trends in order to deliver efficient and high-quality solutions.

As an entrepreneur, I also had the opportunity to learn about project management and problem-solving.

Get in touch with me to exchange ideas and discuss potential collaborations, I'm always looking for new challenges.
